abstract: The British bank HSBC said that it had completed the sale of its entire 15.6 percent stake in the Ping An Insurance Group to the Charoen Pokphand Group of Thailand for $9.4 billion, despite previous concerns about the buyer’s financing.
snippet: The British bank HSBC said that it had completed the sale of its entire 15.6 percent stake in the Ping An Insurance Group to the Charoen Pokphand Group of Thailand for $9.4 billion, despite previous concerns about the buyer’s financing.

headline.main: HSBC Completes Sale of Its Stake in an Insurer
headline.print_headline: HSBC Completes Sale of Its Stake In an Insurer
